title: go test: says "FAIL" instead of "ok" when running benchmarks
body:
by **trolleriprofessorn**: 
"go test" gives confusing output when running benchmarks. Here is an example:

al:prio>go test
ok  	prio
PASS
al:prio>go test -bench="Bench"
FAIL	prio
PASS
BenchmarkPop	 1000000	      1752 ns/op


Which revision are you using? 52ae6fbcc97a
